channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Smart Rings, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: A svelte smart ring can track important health metrics and doesn’t need to be charged every day.

item.title: OpenAI rolls out safety routing system, parental controls on ChatGPT
item.description: The new safety features come after numerous incidents of ChatGPT validating users' delusional thinking instead of redirecting harmful conversations --...

item.title: Trump’s Energy Department forbids staff from saying ‘climate change’ or ‘green’
item.description: A Trump appointee emailed Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy employees last week with a long list of banned words.

item.title: Everything You Need to Know About USB Ports and Speeds (2025)
item.description: USB-C was supposed to make everything simple. Instead, it’s more complicated than ever. So let's clear up the confusion.

item.title: Bluesky rolls out age verification for users in Ohio
item.description: Users in Ohio will have to verify their age to use Bluesky's social network as of Monday.

item.title: The 3 Best Coffee Subscription Deals for National Coffee Day 2025
item.description: National Coffee Day is September 29. See how to get half off WIRED's favorite 3 coffee subscriptions.

item.title: Snapchat caps free Memory storage, launches paid storage plans
item.description: The social media giant announced that free access to the feature will be limited to 5GB.

item.title: This Is Why You Should Try Ultralight Backpacking (2025)
item.description: You can camp in the backcountry with under 10 pounds of gear and be warm, comfortable, and fed. Here's WIRED's guide to shedding weight.

item.title: Qualcomm’s Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme Performance Puts Pressure Back on Intel and Apple
item.description: We ran some early benchmarks on reference units to see how Qualcomm's new Snapdragon X2 Elite chip stacks up to the competition.

item.title: Final day to apply: Volunteer at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: If you’ve been thinking about applying to volunteer at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, this is it — applications close tonight at 11:59 p.m. PT. Only accepti...
